programme.title: Bondgården
programme.desc: Amerikansk animerad familjefilm från 2006. När bonden drar sig tillbaka reser sig djuren på två ben och börjar leva loppan i ladan. Spralliga kon Otis har alltid en massa upptåg för sig, men när hans far som har ansvaret för att skydda gårdens djur blir dödad av prärievargar måste Otis ta sig i kragen och ta över sin pappas roll.

programme.title: Bortspolad
programme.desc: Amerikansk animerad komedi från 2006. Roddy är en överklassråtta som lever det goda livet som husdjur i en flott våning. När kloakråttan Sid en dag dyker upp förändras hans liv. Roddy bestämmer sig för att försöka bli av med Sid genom att lura ner honom i toaletten, men allt går inte som planerat och det blir Roddy som spolas ner till den okända råttvärlden i kloakerna.

programme.title: Space dogs
programme.desc: Rysk animerad komedi från 2010. Belka kastas ut på Moskvas gator när hennes kanon slutar fungera på cirkusen. Här träffar hon överlevaren Strelkas och hennes hopplösa kompis, råttan Lyonya. En dag tillfångatas de av några skumma typer i en mystisk svart bil och upptäcker snart att de är en del av det ryska rymdprogrammet. Kommer de att bli de första hundarna i rymden?

programme.desc: When the liquefied remains of a wedding planner are found in her home tanning bed on Valentine's Day, Cam pressures her team to solve the case in time for her to celebrate the holiday with her boyfriend.

programme.title: Bones

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The Charmed Ones get stuck in a time loop while trying to save a boy who was kidnapped.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The sisters face a cloven-hoofed demon that undoes all the spells they have cast.

programme.title: Charmed

programme.title: Charmed

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Annie Hawkins, an old hunter friend, asks Sam and Dean for help on a case, but when they arrive in town, they learn that Annie has disappeared.

programme.sub-title: The Girl With the Dungeons and Dragons Tattoo
programme.desc: Dick Roman acquires Frank's hard drive, which contains sensitive information about the Winchesters, and gives it to an unsuspecting hacker who has 48 hours to break the code.

programme.desc: Meg calls Dean and Sam and tells them Castiel is awake and talking. Meanwhile, a teenager gets hit by a bolt of lightening and is turned into a reluctant prophet.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The NCIS team partners with Homeland Security after the murder of a Navy master diver is linked to chatter of a foreign attack on the city.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team uncovers a mole in the ranks while working with the Department of Homeland Security to locate 900 missing pounds of explosives that pose an imminent threat to New Orleans.

programme.desc: Pride faces further backlash from the FBI when he helps former Navy Intelligence Analyst Elvis Bertrand, who is the lead suspect in a multiple homicide case.Guests: Tom Arnold, Grace..

programme.desc: Upon finding that Crowley has surrounded Kevin's mom with demons, Sam and Dean rescue her and take her along on their quest to find the tablet.

programme.title: Supernatural

programme.desc: Sam and Dean become unknowing participants in a unique student film when they investigate a bizarre murder in a college town.

programme.title: One Royal Holiday
programme.desc: A woman offers stranded family a place to stay during a blizzard. Unbeknownst to her, they are members of a royal family. Despite their different backgrounds, the woman shows her guests what a small-town Christmas is all about.

programme.title: Christmas Sail
programme.desc: A woman returns home for the holidays to take care of her estranged father, give her daughter a perfect Christmas, and reconnect with her best friend.

programme.title: Christmas Wishes and Mistletoe Kisses
programme.desc: A woman is hired to decorate an estate building a few weeks before Christmas. While there, she works to break down the wall between her and the business owner, all while keeping the holiday spirit alive.

programme.title: A Timeless Christmas
programme.desc: A man travels from 1903 to 2020, where he meets a woman giving tours of his home and experiences a 21st Century Christmas.

programme.title: Christmas Scavenger Hunt
programme.desc: A woman heads home for the holidays, things get complicated and she is forced to work together with her ex for the towns annual scavenger hunt.

programme.title: A Christmas Carousel
programme.desc: A woman is hired by a Royal family to repair a carousel for them before Christmas.

programme.title: Jingle Around the Clock
programme.desc: A woman plans a Christmas to remember with her college friends, only to be thwarted by an opportunity she can't pass up. Much to her surprise, she is forced to team up with a man who has a completely different view of what Christmas really means.

programme.title: It's Christmas, Eve
programme.desc: A school superintendent is forced to make cutbacks during the holiday season. A chance encounter leads her to meet a man and his young daughter, which leads to an unexpected romance, and a new song for her repertoire.

programme.title: Check Inn to Christmas
programme.desc: A town's Christmas celebration is used to reunite two families to save an inn.

programme.title: Boyfriends of Christmas Past
programme.desc: A marketing executive is visited by the ghosts of her four ex-boyfriends leading up to Christmas. In the process, she needs to learn to open her heart, or she may risk losing her best friend.

programme.title: The Mistletoe Promise
programme.desc: Two strangers who share a disdain for Christmas navigate their holiday complications together by creating The Mistletoe Promise. As they spend more time with each other, they discover there may be more to their contract.

programme.title: Switched for Christmas
programme.desc: Identical twin sisters decide to swap lives for the holidays, learning valuable lessons along the way.

programme.title: Sense, Sensibility and Snowmen
programme.desc: A Christmas enthusiast, and her sister, clash with their latest client, a not-so-jolly toy company CEO.

programme.title: Gingerbread Miracle
programme.desc: Two old high school friends spend Christmas trying to sell one of their uncle's Mexican bakery that's known for their gingerbread cookies that magically grant wishes.

programme.title: Five Star Christmas
programme.desc: When a travel writer shows up unexpectedly at their dad's B&B, the Ralston family all pretend to be guests in hopes of a good review.

programme.title: Holiday Date
programme.desc: A man poses as a former boyfriend for a woman when she returns home for the holidays. As her family celebrates Christmas, he requests they also celebrate Hanukah and a merry ruse is born.

programme.title: Miss Christmas
programme.desc: Nicknamed 'Miss Christmas,' the official tree finder for the Radcliffee tree lighting, is left desperate to find the perfect tree. A letter sends her to a small town and a man who doesn't want to part with this tree.

programme.title: Christmas at the Plaza
programme.desc: A historian is hired to create a Christmas display at the Plaza. While working, she learns that fate has prevailed and teamed her up with a handsome decorator to help bring the display, and their romance, to life.

programme.title: Christmas at the Palace
programme.desc: A woman agrees to help put on a skating pageant for a Christmas obsessed kingdom. Her joy, and love for the sport, catches the eye of the king, and they instantly fall for each other.

programme.title: The Christmas Cure
programme.desc: An emergency room doctor returns home for Christmas and reunites with old friends and family and is asked to take over her dad's old practice. The doctor must now choose between a new life and an old one.

programme.title: The Santa Stakeout
programme.desc: Two police detectives pose as newlyweds to solve recent holiday party heists. But they are soon swept up by the Christmas spirit while observing their prime suspect, and begin to fall in love.

programme.title: Heart of the Holidays
programme.desc: A career-driven woman returns to her hometown for the holidays and faces her high-school boyfriend. Together, they rediscover what matters most in life.

programme.title: Christmas at Pemberley Manor
programme.desc: A rookie party planner works with a serious and all-business to put together a Christmas festival with help from a merrily enigmatic caretaker who looks like Santa. As the festival approaches, the spirit of the holidays may lead to a wish of love.

programme.title: A Wish for Christmas
programme.desc: Santa grants a wish for a woman and she gets a chance to prove herself to her boss. Santa's wish only gives her 48 hours and as the clock ticks down, she channels the Christmas magic and speaks her mind all on her own.
